# VolumeSnapshot

A snapshot of a volume. Only boot volumes can have snapshots.

## Properties

Name | Type | Description | Notes
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
**create_time** | **str** | Output only. The creation time of the snapshot. | [optional] [readonly] 
**description** | **str** | The description of the snapshot. | [optional] 
**id** | **str** | Output only. An identifier for the snapshot, generated by the backend. | [optional] [readonly] 
**name** | **str** | The name of the snapshot. | [optional] 
**storage_volume** | **str** | Output only. The name of the volume which this snapshot belongs to. | [optional] [readonly] 
**type** | **str** | Output only. The type of the snapshot which indicates whether it was scheduled or manual/ad-hoc. | [optional] [readonly]
